ISSUE.TITLE: Anybody who knows how to set the JWT secret ?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I check the code and i need to set my own JWT token, but i don't know where to get the STF's secret or set my own secret. the code is here https://github.com/openstf/stf/blob/master/lib/units/app/middleware/auth.js#L10

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Update Dockerfile for Debian x86_64 (#137) - Update "LABEL Url" from openstf to devicefarmer Signed-off-by: Denis barbaron denis.barbaron@orange.com
